name: No Boil Lasagna
author: Donna Stamp
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°. In a saucepan brown ground beef, drain excess fat. Add 1 quart spaghetti sauce and 1 cup water, bring to a boil. In a large bowl, mix together with cottage cheese, beaten egg, Mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup water, 4 cup Parmesan cheese and parsley flakes. Add salt and pepper if desired. To assemble, use uncooked lasagna strips but rinsed in hot water before layering in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Approximately 4 Lasagna strips will fit in pan for a single layer, 3 lengthwise and 1 crosswise. Layer as follows: 1/3 cup hot sauce, lasagna strips, 1?2 cheese mix- ture, 1/3 cup hot sauce, lasagna strips, rest of cheese mixture, 1/3 c. hot sauce, lasagna strips and remaining sauce. Top with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese. Bake at 375°, covered with aluminum foil, for 40 minutes. Remove foil and bake for 15 minutes more. Important, let stand for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting.
